Java.name: BurnedPancake
Java.template: $package   import plm.universe.pancake.PancakeEntity;  public class BurnedPancake extends PancakeEntity {	 	public void run() { 		this.solve(); 	}  $body  }

Scala.name: BurnedPancake

Python.name: BurnedPancake

helps.pt:
PancakeWorld

This universe is very simple, with only five functions provided.

[!java|c]int [/!]getStackSize()  [!scala]:Int[/!]
Returns the size of the stack, that is the amount of pancakes it contains. 
[!java|c]int [/!]getPancakeRadius([!java|c]int [/!]rank[!scala]:Int[/!])  [!scala]:Int[/!]
Returns the radius of the pancake passed as argument, with the rank of the top-most pancake being 0. 
[!java]boolean [/!][!c]int [/!]isPancakeUpsideDown([!java|c]int [/!]rank[!scala]:Int[/!])   [!scala]:Boolean[/!]
Returns whether the pancake passed as argument upside-down, that is, if its burned side is on top. As usual, the top-most pancake is of rank 0. 
[!java|c]void [/!]flip([!java|c]int [/!]amount[!scala]:Int[/!])
Flips the amount first pancakes composing the stack, from the top of it. 
[!java]boolean [/!][!c]int [/!]isSorted()   [!scala]:Boolean[/!]
Returns whether the pancake stack is correctly sorted. 
[!java]boolean [/!][!c]int [/!]isSelected()   [!scala]:Boolean[/!]
Returns whether the current world is selected in the graphical interface.

PancakeWorld

This universe is very simple, with only five functions provided.

[!java|c]int [/!]getStackSize()  [!scala]:Int[/!]
Returns the size of the stack, that is the amount of pancakes it contains. 
[!java|c]int [/!]getPancakeRadius([!java|c]int [/!]rank[!scala]:Int[/!])  [!scala]:Int[/!]
Returns the radius of the pancake passed as argument, with the rank of the top-most pancake being 0.

Returns whether the pancake passed as argument upside-down, that is, if its burned side is on top. As usual, the top-most pancake is of rank 0. 
[!java|c]void [/!]flip([!java|c]int [/!]amount[!scala]:Int[/!])
Flips the amount first pancakes composing the stack, from the top of it.

helps.fr:
Monde des crêpes

Cet univers est très simple, avec seulement cinq fonctions fournies.

[!java|c]int [/!]getTaillePile()  [!scala]:Int[/!]
Renvoie la taille du tas de crêpes, c'est à dire le nombre de crêpes qui le compose. 
[!java|c]int [/!]getRayonCrepe([!java|c]int [/!]rang[!scala]:Int[/!])  [!scala]:Int[/!]
Renvoie le rayon de la crêpe passée en argument, sachant que le rang de la crêpe du haut est 0. 
[!java]boolean [/!][!c]int [/!]estCrepeRetournee([!java|c]int [/!]rang[!scala]:Int[/!])   [!scala]:Boolean[/!]
Renvoie si la crêpe passée en paramètre (la crêpe du haut étant de rang 0) est à l'envers, c'est-à-dire si sa face brûlée est en haut. 
[!java|c]void [/!]retourne([!java|c]int [/!]quantité[!scala]:Int[/!])
Retourne les quantité premières crêpes de la pile, en partant du sommet de celle-ci. 
[!java]boolean [/!][!c]int [/!]estTriee()   [!scala]:Boolean[/!]
Renvoie si la pile de crêpes est correctement triée. 
[!java]boolean [/!][!c]int [/!]estSelectionne() [!scala]:Boolean[/!]
Renvoi si le monde actuel est sélectionné dans l'interface graphique.

initialWorlds.name: 5 pancakes
initialWorlds.about:
PancakeWorld

This universe is very simple, with only five functions provided.

int getStackSize()
Returns the size of the stack, that is the amount of pancakes it contains. 
int getPancakeRadius(int rank)
Returns the radius of the pancake passed as argument, with the rank of the top-most pancake being 0. 
boolean isPancakeUpsideDown(int rank)
Returns whether the pancake passed as argument upside-down, that is, if its burned side is on top. As usual, the top-most pancake is of rank 0. 
void flip(int amount)
Flips the amount first pancakes composing the stack, from the top of it. 
boolean isSorted()
Returns whether the pancake stack is correctly sorted. 
boolean isSelected()
Returns whether the current world is selected in the graphical interface.

instructions.pt:
Panquecas queimadas

Hard blow for the chef! As panquecas queimaram de um lado! Não há forma de entregar uma pilha de panquecas com paquecas visivelmente queimadas! Você tem que ajudá-lo a ter certeza de que nenhuma panqueca está de cabeça pra baixo enquanto ordena esta pilha.
instructions.en:
Burned Pancakes

Hard blow for the chef! The pancakes got burnt on one side! There is no way he can deliver a stack of pancakes with visibly burnt pancakes! You've got to help him ensuring that no pancake is upside-down while sorting his stack.
instructions.fr:
Crêpes brûlées

Coup dur pour le crêpier! Les crêpes ont brûlé sur une face! Il est strictement impossible qu'il serve une pile de crêpes où l'on voit la face brûlée! Vous devez absolument l'aider à s'assurer qu'aucune face visible ne soit brûlée tandis qu'il trie sa pile.
